result.execSummary:
The defendant Andrew L. LUEBKE was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • PTC Theft-Movable Property <=$2500 [Modifiers: Party to a Crime], a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 943.20(1)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Under the Huber Law, consecutive to the sentences imposed on 16 CF 472 and 16 CF 463.  Court authorizes transfer to Sheboygan County Jail.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Andrew L. LUEBKE

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: It is ordered that the victim in this matter, BMO Harris Bank, is hereby awarded a judgment against the defendant in the sum of $219.68 dollars.
$50.00 cash bail returned to Jodi Weaver by check instruction no: CR 128.

Defendant in custody on WRIT.
The State filed an Amended Information which amends the charge to misdemeanor PTC theft, contrary to Section 943.20(1)(a).  
GUILTY plea entered to the amended charge.  Convicted.
The defendant is sentenced to the Manitowoc County Jail for ninety (90) days, under the Huber Law, consecutive to the sentences imposed on 16 CF 463 and 16 CF 472.  Court authorizes transfer to Sheboygan County Jail.
Defendant has credit for 4 days.
Court costs are waived.
The court orders a civil judgment of restitution in favor of BMO Harris Bank in the amount of $219.60.  State to draft.
$50.00 cash bail returned to Jodi Weaver.
Minutes.
Plea date on October 7, 2016 at 11:00 am.
Settlement conference on July 27, 2016 at 10:30 am.
$50.00 cash bail furnished and defendant is released from custody.

ADDRESS INFO for Andrew L. LUEBKE
Current: 1312 Green St, Manitowoc, WI 54220 United States  (Effective: 06-20-2016)
Prior: 412 Park Street C, Manitowoc, WI 54220
Commitment for Failure to Furnish Bail.

BAIL HEARING - 
Defendant in custody on warrant and appearing by video from the Manitowoc County Jail.  The matter is continued for a Plea Date on 07-14-2016 at 9:00 a.m.  Bail is set at $50.00 cash with the continuing conditions that he report to the Manitowoc City Police Department for fingerprints, photographs and other identifying information within 24 hours of release, and have no contact with Joy Herrera.  Bail not furnished and defendant is remanded to the county jail.
Commitment for Failure to Furnish Bail Issued.  Copy filed.
Warrant returned with service of officer thereon.
Minutes.

Defendant failed to appear for plea date.   Bench warrant authorized.   
Minutes.
State's Motion and Demand for Discovery.

Defendant in custody.
Defendant waives his right to a preliminary hearing.  Defendant is bound over to Circuit Court Branch 3 for further proceedings.   Waiver of Right to Preliminary Hearing.
ARRAIGNMENT
Information filed.  Not guilty plea(s).  Jury Calendar.  Settlement conference with the District Attorney is set for 01-28-16 at 2:30 p.m.  Plea date is set for 06-01-16 at 2:00 p.m..   State's Motion and Demand for Discovery.
Minutes.

Defendant in custody.   
Defendant demands a preliminary hearing and waives the statutory time period within which a preliminary hearing must be held.   Preliminary hearing is set for 01-08-16-at 9:00 a.m.   Bail furnsihed.   
Minutes.

Defendant in custody.   
Defendant requests counsel and is referred to the public defender.   Initial appearance is reset to 12-21-15 at 2:30 p.m.   Bail is set at $1,000.00 recognizance bond with the condition that defendant must report to the Manitowoc City Police Department for fingerprints, photographs and other identifying information within 24 hours and defendant is to have no contact with Joy Herrera.  
Minutes.

RE:  Joy Herrera, on 08-05-15.
Initial appearance is set for 12-14-15 at 2:30 p.m.
